name: updateFqdn
description: Update the details of a specific FQDN.

connection_id.description: ID of the FQDN connection to which this IP should be attached.

dns_record_type.description: The DNS record type for the FQDN. For cases where a port is not set, the DNS record type must be 'srv'. For cases where a port is set, the DNS record type must be 'a'. If the DNS record type is 'a' and a port is not specified, 5060 will be used.

port.description: Port to use when connecting to this FQDN.

$ul: **connection_id**: ID of the FQDN connection to which this FQDN is attached.
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

**dns_record_type**: The DNS record type for the FQDN. For cases where a port is not set, the DNS record type must be 'srv'. For cases where a port is set, the DNS record type must be 'a'. If the DNS record type is 'a' and a port is not specified, 5060 will be used.
**port**: Port to use when connecting to this FQDN. (default: 5060)
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was updated.
